Information System|GNIS]] feature ID |blank1_info = |website = |footnotes = }} '''Caress''' is an [[unincorporated area|unincorporated community]] in [[Braxton County, West Virginia|Braxton County]], [[West Virginia]], [[United States]]. ==Toponymy== Caress appears to be the only place in the United States with this name.{{Citation needed|date=January 2008}} It was named by its first postmaster, Harrison Mollohan, for no particular reason after the Post Office Department rejected the name "Hall".{{Citation needed|date=January 2008}} {{Braxton County, West Virginia}} [[Category:Populated places in Braxton County, West Virginia]] [[Category:Unincorporated communities in West Virginia]] {{BraxtonWV-geo-stub}}
